name: Maintenance Accessories
tagline: Care for the machine that cares for your morning.
hero_image_alt: Arco maintenance accessories arranged on a clean white surface — a box of cleaning tablets, a bottle of descaling solution, a group head brush with wooden handle, replacement silicone gaskets, a backflush disc, and microfibre cloths, all neatly organised with clinical precision, bright even lighting with minimal shadows
headline: Longevity is a practice.
subheadline: Cleaning tablets, descaling solutions, brushes, gaskets, and group head tools — everything you need to keep your Arco machine performing at its best for years.
description_short: Cleaning tablets, descaling solutions, brushes, gaskets, and group head tools to keep every Arco machine in peak condition.
description_long: An espresso machine is a precision instrument, and precision instruments need care. Our maintenance range covers every aspect of machine upkeep: phosphate-free cleaning tablets that dissolve coffee oils from the brew circuit, citric acid descaling solution that removes mineral buildup without damaging boilers, group head brushes with heat-resistant bristles, food-grade silicone gaskets sized for every Arco portafilter, and blind baskets for backflushing. A well-maintained machine extracts better, lasts longer, and rewards you with consistent flavour year after year. Maintenance is not a chore — it is the simplest way to protect your investment and your morning.

key_specs.cleaning_tablets: Phosphate-free, biodegradable, 2 g each, dissolves coffee oils and residue
key_specs.descaling_solution: Citric acid-based, safe for all boiler types (copper, brass, stainless), 250 ml per treatment
key_specs.group_head_brush: Heat-resistant nylon bristles, beechwood handle, fits E61 and standard groups
key_specs.gaskets: Food-grade silicone, available for 53 mm and 58 mm portafilters, rated to 200°C
key_specs.blind_basket: Stainless steel, 58 mm, for backflush cleaning
key_specs.shower_screen: Stainless steel replacement, precision-etched, 58 mm and 53 mm
key_specs.water_filters: Activated carbon, reduces scale and chlorine, 60-day replacement cycle
key_specs.compatibility: Designed for all Arco espresso machines

whats_in_box: Each accessory ships individually or as curated kits:
Daily Care Kit: Cleaning tablets (30 pack) + group head brush + 2 microfibre cloths — €29
Quarterly Service Kit: Descaling solution (2 bottles) + cleaning tablets (30 pack) + replacement gasket + shower screen — €49
Annual Overhaul Kit: Descaling solution (4 bottles) + cleaning tablets (60 pack) + gasket set + shower screens + group head brush + water filters (4 pack) + microfibre cloths (4) — €89
All items also available individually from €9
use_case_headline: Perfect for every Arco machine owner — because maintenance is non-negotiable.
use_case_body: Whether you backflush daily or descale quarterly, having the right supplies on hand means you never skip a maintenance step. The kits are sized to match real maintenance schedules, so you always have what you need before you need it.

pairing_products.rationale: E61 group heads benefit most from regular backflushing and gasket replacement.
The saturated group and dual boilers in the Studio Pro demand consistent descaling and group maintenance.
Dual-boiler machines need descaling for both boilers — the Quarterly Kit covers it.
High-volume office use means more frequent cleaning cycles — the Annual Kit is the right fit.
Pair maintenance with preparation accessories for a complete equipment care and brewing setup.
